home.parrafo-info: I'm a programming student and I want you to know me a little!

sobre-mi.title: About me
sobre-mi.texto_sobreMi: In 2021, the world of programming intrigued me and I began to study self-taught. After a while I realized that I loved it! Two years after choosing this path, I am looking for a job that allows me to continue learning, gain experience and strengthen my professional development. I am an empathetic, enterprising and proactive person, with skills that make me enjoy teamwork. I am responsible and persevering, and I always seek to improve myself.

proyectos.title: Projects
proyectos.info-proyecto1: Project created for backend course at Coderhouse, in which I implemented MERN stack
proyectos.info-proyecto2: Tiny project in which I created a simulating drum kit, where you can play it either with the keyboard or by clicking at the screen.
proyectos.info-proyecto4: Project created with React Js with a partner, thanks to being at Top 10 at Coderhouse.
proyectos.info-proyecto5: Project created with React Js with a partner, thanks to being at Top 10 at Coderhouse, with a UX/UI design that was given to us.
proyectos.info-proyecto6: This is my first react app.
